casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Patrick MYLETT 6A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mylett, Patrick Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, for State of North Carolina. Noell P. Tin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Pennsylvania Center for the First Amendment Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of March 2019 to admit Eugene Volokh Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
